subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Matteo Rabottini won the 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia, holding off Joaquin Rodriguez in a close finish as Rodriguez took back the overall lead from Ryder Hesjedal.
snippet: Matteo Rabottini won the 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia, holding off Joaquin Rodriguez in a close finish as Rodriguez took back the overall lead from Ryder Hesjedal.
